welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Crimmitschau, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. Get ready to immerse yourself in our culture and discover all the wonders our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilmington Railway Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wilmington Railway Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Altenburg Nobitz Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Altenburg Nobitz Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
